Description.desc: Only the following vaccines are accepted (EMA or WHO): Jcovden, Spikevax, Comirnaty, Vaxzevria, Covishield, BBIBP-CorV, WIBP-CorV, Inactivated SARS-CoV-2 (Vero Cell), CoronaVac, Covaxin, Covovax, Nuvaxovid, Hipra, Convidecia, Vidprevtyn, Valneva.

Nur die folgenden Impfstoffe werden akzeptiert: Jcovden, Spikevax, Comirnaty, Vaxzevria, Covishield, BBIBP-CorV, WIBP-CorV, Inactivated SARS-CoV-2 (Vero Cell), CoronaVac, Covaxin, Covovax, Nuvaxovid, Hipra, Convidecia, Vidprevtyn, Valneva.

Solo se aceptan las siguientes vacunas (EMA o OMS): Jcovden, Spikevax, Comirnaty, Vaxzevria, Covishield, BBIBP-CorV, WIBP-CorV, Inactivated SARS-CoV-2 (Vero Cell), CoronaVac, Covaxin, Covovax, Nuvaxovid, Hipra, Convidecia, Vidprevtyn, Valneva.

Saranno accettati solamente i seguenti vaccini: Jcovden, Spikevax, Comirnaty, Vaxzevria, Covishield, BBIBP-CorV, WIBP-CorV, Inactivated SARS-CoV-2 (Vero Cell), CoronaVac, Covaxin, Covovax, Nuvaxovid, Hipra, Convidecia, Vidprevtyn, Valneva.
